artist: After Peter de Witte; Aegidius Sadeler
description: Church Father, St. Jerome seated at a table, writing; half length profile left; cross and skull on table; lion head lower right corner
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black:Foe cundat scripltis arentem HIERONYMVS orbem, / Scilicet exhaustas e cruce fundit opes. Marco Sadeler excudit / Petrus Candid invent. Eg: Sadeler sculpsit | on sheet in pencil: 2-349
title: Hieronymus
